items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system to provide personalized product suggestions to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for a logged-in user within 2 seconds of page load
Recommendations update dynamically when user interacts with products (views, adds to cart, purchases)
Recommendation relevance score exceeds 80% in A/B testing compared to baseline
System supports cold-start recommendations for new users based on trending products
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Response time under 2 seconds for recommendation generation
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. Specific AI model type and hosting environment not provided by user.
